Custom theme based on unity

Source: R/theme.R
custom_theme.Rd

Custom theme based on unity

Usage

custom_theme(
  ...,
  version = 5,
  primary = "#1E4A8F",
  secondary = "#FF6F61",
  bootswatch = "united",
  base_font = bslib::font_google("Montserrat"),
  heading_font = bslib::font_google("Public Sans", wght = "700"),
  code_font = bslib::font_google("Open Sans")
)

Arguments

...

everything passed on to bslib::bs_theme()

Value

theme list
